edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model

Class RequirementsTrackerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model.RequirementsTrackerModel

  • public class RequirementsTrackerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    model for requirement list maintains singleton instance of RequirementTrackerModel provides method to interact with GUI
    Author:
    Summer Mims

      • addRequirement

        public void addRequirement(java.lang.String summary,
                           java.lang.String acceptanceTestId)
        create and add a new requirement with its summary and acceptance test id. A new unique requirement id is created at this time for the requirement.
        Parameters:
        summary - summary description of the requirement
        acceptanceTestId - test id for tracking acceptance
